prototype_cloaking_device.name: Prototype Cloaking Device I
prototype_cloaking_device.description: A basic cloaking device that renders the ship invisible to most sensors. Imposes severe speed and scan resolution penalties while active.

improved_cloaking_device.name: Improved Cloaking Device II
improved_cloaking_device.description: An advanced cloaking device with reduced recalibration time and lower penalties compared to the prototype version.

covert_ops_cloaking_device.name: Covert Ops Cloaking Device II
covert_ops_cloaking_device.description: A specialized cloaking device designed for covert operations ships. Allows warping while cloaked.

jump_drive_economy.name: Jump Drive Economy I
jump_drive_economy.description: An economy-class jump drive with reduced range but lower fuel consumption. Allows capital ships to jump between star systems.

jump_drive_standard.name: Jump Drive I
jump_drive_standard.description: A standard jump drive enabling capital ships to traverse between star systems via cynosural fields.

capital_shield_booster.name: Capital Shield Booster I
capital_shield_booster.description: A massive shield booster designed for capital-class vessels, providing tremendous shield restoration per cycle.

capital_armor_repairer.name: Capital Armor Repairer I
capital_armor_repairer.description: A capital-sized armor repair module capable of restoring vast amounts of armor hit points per cycle.

capital_remote_armor_repairer.name: Capital Remote Armor Repairer I
capital_remote_armor_repairer.description: A capital-class remote armor repair module used by carrier and force auxiliary pilots to restore allied ships' armor.

capital_remote_shield_booster.name: Capital Remote Shield Booster I
capital_remote_shield_booster.description: A capital-class remote shield booster used to restore allied ships' shields at considerable range.

capital_energy_neutralizer.name: Capital Energy Neutralizer I
capital_energy_neutralizer.description: A powerful capital-sized energy neutralizer that drains enormous amounts of capacitor energy from the target.

siege_module.name: Siege Module I
siege_module.description: Enters siege mode for 5 minutes, dramatically increasing damage but immobilizing the ship.

triage_module.name: Triage Module I
triage_module.description: Enters triage mode for 5 minutes, dramatically increasing remote repair capabilities.

capital_missile_launcher.name: Capital Torpedo Launcher I
capital_missile_launcher.description: A capital-sized torpedo launcher capable of delivering devastating kinetic warheads against large targets.

xl_cruise_missile_launcher.name: XL Cruise Missile Launcher I
xl_cruise_missile_launcher.description: An extra-large cruise missile launcher designed for capital ships, offering higher rate of fire at the cost of per-hit damage.
